application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: Prune 1 x Acer spp(T2) and 1 x Horse Chestnut (Aesculus hippocastanum)(T3) in front of block 1-28; Prune 1 x Sycamore x 1 (Acer pseudoplatanus)(T4) and 2 x Cherry (Prunus spp)(T5 & T6) at rear of block 1-28; Prune 1 x London Plane (Platanus x hispanica)(T1) and 1 x Lime (Tilia spp) (T15) at front of block 29-54; Prune 2 x Lime (Tilia spp)(T7 & T8), 1 x Cypress hedge(T9), 1 x Bay (Laurus nobilis)(T10), 1 x Sorbus spp(T11) at rear of block 29-54; Prune 1 x Sycamore (Acer pseudoplatanus)(T13) and 1 x Ash (Fraxinus excelsior)(T14) on Ilchester place frontage; and Prune 1 x Sycamore (Acer pseudoplatanus)(T12) on left hand side of block 29-54.
